metadata.title: CVE-2023-32359 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.This issue is fixed in iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2. A user's password maybe read aloud by VoiceOver.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
